properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Baba yetu upokee sadaka. x2
Ndiyo mapato
ya kazi yetu za wiki
tunakuomba upokee Baba.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pokea mkate huu,
pokea divai hii uitakate.
Ni mazao yetu toka mashambani,
uitakate.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pokea fedha hii
tunakutolea uitakate.
Ndiyo bidii baba
uliyotujalia uitakate.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na maombi yetu,
Baba uyapokee sisi ni wako.
Kwani uwezo wote
una wewe Baba tusikilize.
